name: League Of Extraordinary Birds HD
description:
“League of Extraordinary Birds are cute. In fact, the graphics are colorful, crisp, and thoroughly adorable.” - Appadvice

“The game’s visuals look great and they bring some much needed interest” – 148apps

“League of Extraordinary Birds won me over for being fun, well designed, and artfully bizarre” –popugamer

Oh no! The baby birds are taken hostage by the big bad evil green monster (and his weird evil friends)! It is now up to League of Extraordinary Birds to save them! They may look small but each one of them carries unique tricks up their sleeves.

Get ready to lift off on an epic journey! Collect coins, Get awesome powerups and free yourself out of many challenging nasty situations! For you are the League of Extraordinary!

Game Features:
*8 Unique extraordinary birds
*4 Unique extraordinary stage themes
*Lots of extraordinary powerups
*Tons of extraordinary items
*One Touch control
*40 Challenging Achievements
*Surprise Guest Appearance
*Amazing cartoon graphics and special effects.

★★★★★
